Html:
Anyone having an issue with returns being injected into content?

The Html I'm parsing is:

Selective catalytic reduction of NO.sub.x enabled by urea decomposition in
     heat-exchanger bypass

And what I'm getting afterwards is:

"Selective catalytic reduction of NO.sub.x enabled by urea decomposition in\n     heat-exchanger bypass\n"

If you go tohttp://patft.uspto.gov/netacgi/nph-Parser?Sect1=PTO2&Sect2=HITOFF&u=%2Fnetahtml%2FPTO%2Fsearch-adv.htm&r=0&p=1&f=S&l=50&d=PTXT&Query=in/"Boyle"%20AND%20isd/11/1/2009->1/4/2010

you'll see

3 7,615,200 Selective catalytic reduction of NO.sub.x enabled by urea decomposition in heat-exchanger bypass

But after parsing using 

doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes("//table")[1].SelectNodes("//a")[13].InnerHtml

 I'm getting

"Selective catalytic reduction of NO.sub.x enabled by urea decomposition in\n     heat-exchanger bypass\n"

Any ideas????

Thanks
